Sencha Touch 2 - JavaScript Framework

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0

Release Notes: Release Notes: November 6, 2012
Version Number: 2.1.0

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Improved docs for Ext.Component#add param type
    • Make Ext.Loader#setPath 2nd param optional in documentation
    • Document CompositeElement as having all Element methods
    • Added Chart Marker documentation
    • Added moving average to Stock Example
    • [TOUCH-3565] Allow legend chart binding via name
    • Updated documentation for Ext.feature, Ext.browser, Ext.os
    • [VJET-226] Make Ext.app.Application#getController method public
    • [TOUCH-3580] Allow associationKey to map to nested data
    • Changed behavior of Store to not sync the existing records as being removed when reloading the Store with new records
    • Updated documentation for the Ext.draw.Color static methods
    • Added device.Contacts method descriptions into abstract interface and moved config from implementation class into abstract
    • Added missing Card Layout documentation back in
    • Native Contacts API is now public and available
    • Improved the packager.json documentation for native builds
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-3558] Fixed labelAlign of fields with left and right alignment
    • [TOUCH-3570] Fixed dynamic grouping within a List
    • Fixed docs for Ext#application parameters
    • Fixed Select#store cfg type documentation
    • [TOUCH-3577] Fixed issue with loadMask indicator being set to false
    • [TOUCH-3547] Fixed issue with visibleRange where it could ge into an infinite loop when being passed bad parameters
    • [TOUCH-3530] Fixed issue with legend interaction in KitchenSink example
    • Fixed @cfg docs in Ext.util.Grouper
    • [VJET-232] Fixed type of Application#requires config
    • [TOUCH-3572] Fixed issue with orientationchange event on Chrome Mobile
    • [TOUCH-3573] Fixed an issue where goToNode would not show the correct list when called from within a detail card
    • [TOUCH-3475] Fixed issue with header overlap in a list on Android
    • [TOUCH-3582] Fixed iOS6 simulator detection
    • [TOUCH-3583] Fixed an issue where anyMatch wasn't respected on filters in the SQL proxy
    • Fixed an initial jump of bar chart
    • Fixed type definition of Ext.dataview.NestedList#store
    • Fixed gradients being added to a series
    • [TOUCH-3494] Fixed issue with native packager in Windows related to code signing
    • [TOUCH-3579] Fixed some issues related to updating records in a list that is hidden
    • [TOUCH-1176] Fixed issue where prepareData wasn't used in a List
    • Fixed Floating point rounding error for Canvas
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has issues with clearing it's graphics buffer when using Canvas. We are forcing our SVG implementation on this specific version of Android.

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-rc2

Release Notes: Release Notes: October 12, 2012
Version Number: 2.1.0-rc2

We are now preparing for the final GA release of Touch 2.1. Until then we will be focusing on bug fixing, documentation, and performance tweaks.

A DOM change was made to ListItems to improve performance by removing a level of box nesting. If you use a header with a custom height you will need to set that height in the sass For example: 

                .x-list-normal {
                  &.x-list-grouped .x-list-header-wrap .x-dock-horizontal {
                      padding-top: 26px;
                  }
                }

In addition if you were targeting ".x-list-item .x-dock-vertical", this will change to ".x-list-item .x-dock-horizontal".

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Change ListItems to not use vertical docking for headers. This improves performance since there is less DOM and less box layouts
    • SVG is now forced on Android 4.1 devices due to Canvas issues
    • [TOUCH-3543] Added chart axis minZoom and maxZoom configurations
    • [TOUCH-3508] Added `action` to bubbleEvents on text field
    • Added in missing chart documentation for engine, modifiers, chart, series sprites, labels, grid, axis, interactions, and more
    • [TOUCH-3551] Added filtering and sorting capabilities to the SQL proxy
    • [TOUCH-3554] Make sure NestedList creates a TreeStore when you specify an object for its store config
    • Ensure the processed records are applied to the ResultSet in Operation
    • Changed the way native package view controllers switch (on iOS), now we use window.controller property instead of using "addView", this is required by iOS 6
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-3243] Fixed alignment of message in load mask
    • [TOUCH-3531] Fixed issues with the zIndex of the chart watermark
    • Fixed many the trailing comma warnings for production builds
    • Fixed chart Highlight dependency
    • Fixed improper popup syntax for chart interactions
    • Fixed example icons and added chart examples to the Documentation
    • Fixed update/new tags for 2.1 and the documentation should now properly be tagged for 2.1
    • [TOUCH-3480] Fixed removeAll on TreeStore
    • [TOUCH-3553, TOUCH-3196, TOUCH-3041] Fixed hard error with multitouch on Android 4.0.x devices
    • Fixed destroy method on chart's animation modifier which could cause charts to stop responding when animations were interrupted
    • Fixed touchstart detection on BlackBerry 6
    • [TOUCH-3535] Fixed webview detection when running inside an iOS UIWebView
    • [TOUCH-2997] Fixed issue with date picker days
    • [TOUCH-3564] Fixed Ext.Anim to use Ext.define instead of extend
    • Fixed builder issue with generation of delta file
    • Fixed builder issue with incorrect alias generation
    • [TOUCH-3559] Fixed native purchases model typo
    • [TOUCH-3562] Fixed issue with sencha generate app corrupting binary template files
    • [TOUCH-3486] Fixed issue where List items weren't being properly updated when refreshing a hidden list
    • Fixed native package error when signing application on Mac
    • Fixed native package webview layout (+/- 20px on top)
    • Fixed native package modal viewcontrollers layout
    • [TOUCH-3569] Fixed error where adding google maps to app.json causing build to fail
    • [TOUCH-3562] Fixed sencha generate app corrupting binary template files
    • [TOUCH-3245] Fixed issue with Command not forcing compass to compile scss and ignore cache files
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has issues with clearing it's graphics buffer when using Canvas. We are forcing our SVG implementation on this specific version of Android.

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-rc1

Version Number: 2.1.0-rc1

We are now preparing for the final GA release of Touch 2.1. Until then we will be focusing on bug fixing, documentation, and performance tweaks.

    • [TOUCH-3473, TOUCH-3457] Fixed issue with Carousel not animating properly due to javascript's typeof NaN == 'number'...

    • Fixed apple.scss warning
    • [TOUCH-3502] Fixed performance issue for radio fields
    • [TOUCH-3212] Fixed some filename issues with some example icons
    • Fixed native packager issues with iOS6
    • Fixed orientation change on iOS6
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has some issues with clearing it's graphics buffer when canvas is resized. We will have a workaround before the GA release
    • Examples are still being polished for all devices

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b3

Release Notes: Release Notes: September 10, 2012
Version Number: 2.1.0-b3

The new List component is included with this release. This implementation replaces the old one for lists and is no longer bound one-to-one between a store and DOM elements. This means that the length of the list will no longer have a bearing on it's scrolling performance. In addition, lists can use components if you specify them with an itemConfig and itemTpl will be converted to an itemConfig dynamically if you specify one. Due to these changes, the DOM structure was altered for lists and you may need to change some css selectors to add appropriate styling for your lists. Typically you need to change the selector from '.x-list-item' to '.x-list-item > .x-dock-vertical > .x-dock-body' for any padding or margins you may have added. We have change the TouchTweets example from using a component based DataView to the new List very easily and should be a good example of using the new List component with dynamic large lists.

We are releasing an update to Sencha Command and the Native Packager. This includes many bugfixes and enhancements including:

  • in-app purchases API for iOS
  • Contacts APIs for iOS and Android
  • Push notifications for iOS
  • openURL support
The Native packages are also now plugin based and includes an API for developers to write their own plugins.

We continue to add more to charting, and this release includes some of the labeling, grouped bar charts, axis titles, and more. We want the next release for charting to be feature complete so expect the last chart types and missing functionality to be added soon.

Once again, thank you for all the reported issues, we have fixed many bugs for this release and continue to work hard on them. The major changes are now in place and we are continuing to work on performance enhancements and bug fixes until the release is ready.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Updated many documentation examples and links
    • [TOUCH-2977] Toggle field now fires change event when toggled or when the value is changed.
    • Sunlight Labs has resolved the issue with our API calls to their servers therefore the GeoCongress demo now fully works again.
    • [TOUCH-3240] Changed default values of title + message in MessageBox to null
    • Axis titles added to Charts
    • Charts now handle padding configs given in objects
    • Added 'stepped' config for area/line chart
    • Added Grouped bar chart
    • [TOUCH-3236] Changed the default modal config for Ext.Msg to `true`
    • Improved Android 4 Scroll Indicator performance
    • [TOUCH-1209] Enabled focus event firing on all devices that support it
    • [TOUCH-2854] Added the paste and input events into the DOM event recognizer. Paste and dropdown selection will now trigger
    • Improved cleanup of stores in a field Select upon destroy
    • Improve label positioning in SVG
    • Improve animation parser for charts
    • fillOpacity/strokeOpacity are now handled properly during animations
    • [TOUCH-3281] Added valid modes documentation for tplWriteMode configuration of Component
    • Added FlipXY configuration to cartesian charts. Simplifies bar to column conversion
    • Optimized segment tree algorhythm for chart aggregation
    • Added Candlestick and OHLC examples to kitchen sink
    • Added webkitBackingStorePixelRatio support
    • Added destroy check on updateLength method of Throttled Indicator
    • Update Button SASS so it looks better on device
    • Added some wrapping for Panel anchors, normalized icon names, no longer using transforms
    • [TOUCH-3361] Added lastUpdatedText configuration to PullToRefresh
    • Added proper support for IE10 animateStartTime
    • Updated TouchTweet to consume 50 records at a time
    • Added cross zooming interaction to charts
    • Added 'x-list-item-first' and 'x-list-item-last' to very first and very last List item (not in every group)
    • Added new configuration options variableHeights, itemHeight and refreshHeightOnUpdate to List. All three allow you to configure the list to be much more performant if your list conforms to certain rules
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-2794] Fixed an issue where passing a function as filter to the Store's filter method would cause an invalid Filter instance to be created
    • Fixed issues that can arise when using syncRemovedRecords and destroyRemovedRecords
    • Fixed issues with sizeDetection when items are destroyed
    • [TOUCH-3237] Fixed issue when trying to change zIndex of a destroyed component
    • [TOUCH-3238] Fixed issue when trying to setParent(null) on container
    • [TOUCH-3247] Fixed missing alias for 'auto' layout
    • [TOUCH-3040] Fixed issues when the XML reader handles complex mapping
    • [TOUCH-3239] Fixed issue where the change event was not being fired for DatePicker
    • Fixed canvas resizing problem

    • Fixed isLayout flag to abstract layout class

    • Fixed showBy orientation change
    • Fixed layout issues with geocongress

    • Fixed bbox problem for some Draw cases
    • [TOUCH-3253] Fixed discrete layout on date axes from missing labels

    • Fixed Android 4 square box webkit masking issues for buttons, tabs, dropdown indicators, and showBy panel anchors
    • Fixed StoreManager dependency issue
    • [TOUCH-3293] Fixed grid clipping in charts
    • [TOUCH-3265] Fixed issue with setting a detailCard to null in NestedList
    • [TOUCH-3303] Fixed issue with hiding a component when adding it to a container as the active item
    • [TOUCH-3278] Fixed documentation for the CompositeElementLite add method
    • [TOUCH-3275] Fixed documentation for private methods in Video component
    • [TOUCH-3280] Fixed Ext.create documentation with an example that applies to Touch
    • Fixed some destroying checks for Layout
    • [TOUCH-3294] Fixed issue with dock-body not having a default 100% height
    • [TOUCH-3343] Fixed hiding an item being added to a Card layout if it's inner index matched the activeItem index
    • [TOUCH-3341] Fixed Date Picker not firing the 'pick' event. Also removed the 'slotpick' event from tap as it is also being fired on scrollEnd
    • [TOUCH-3276] Fixed issue with SegmentedButton firing the toggle event when initially setting the pressed config
    • [TOUCH-3356] Fixed issue with -webkit-box-shaow being used instead of the box-shadow sass mixin. Changed all uses to the mixin

  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • Kiva is currently using a static data set to reduce strain on their systems.

    • The Draw/Chart implementation is incomplete and does not include the following:
      • Gauge Chart implementation
      • Radar Chart implementation
      • Chart Legends
      • Chart Highlighting
      • Polar Chart interactions
      • Icicle/TreeMap/Sunburst implementations

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b2

Release Notes: Release Notes: August 7, 2012
Version Number: 2.1.0-b2

Thank you for all the feedback on the first release, this beta for Touch 2.1 is includes many performance enhancements to Layouts and DOM events as well as additional drawing and charting enhancements.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Added Area Chart
    • Added Stacked Column Charts
    • Added 3D Pie Chart
    • Polar rotate interaction implemented
    • Scatter chart performance improved and adjustments made for upcoming label support
    • Painted event detection has been refactored for improved performance
    • SizeMonitor refactored for improved performance
    • Masks and Modals are now structured around the updated DOM structure
    • [TOUCH-3163] Templates will now ignore 'null' when applying values
    • [TOUCH-3050] Added openURL function into the sencha device package to allow for opening urls
    • TitleBar/Toolbar now have a default height instead of pure CSS
    • [TOUCH-3199] Added safeguard against pullHeight not being set in PullToRefresh
    • [TOUCH-3169] Added Ext.util.Offset, cleaned up some Region methods
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-3164] Fixed getUsername typo in Ajax proxy
    • [TOUCH-2991] Fixed default logger config to be false insead of 'no'
    • [TOUCH-3076] Fixed xindex and xcount issues
    • Fixed pan/zoom offset bug
    • [TOUCH-3183] Fixed issue with isGrouped method
    • [TOUCH-3181] Fixed issue with destroying a DataView with no store
    • [TOUCH-3171] Fixed issues with Store consuming an empty Array
    • Fixed Canvas gradient opacity issues on Android devices
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • Kiva is currently using a static data set to reduce strain on their systems.
    • The Kitchensink example is becoming too large to fit into an iPad1's limited memory. We may break out some examples due to this issue.
    • The Draw/Chart implementation is incomplete and does not include the following:
      • Bar Chart implementation
      • Grouped Chart implementations
      • Gauge Chart implementation
      • Radar Chart implementation
      • Chart Legends
      • Chart Labels
      • Chart Highlighting
      • Polar Chart interactions
      • Icicle/TreeMap/Sunburst implementations
      • Table based layout implementation (as opposed to CSS flex box based layout)
    • Card Layout performance enhancements
    • New DataView/List implementation for large data sets

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b1

Release Notes: Release Notes: July 19, 2012
Version Number: 2.1.0-b1

This is the initial beta for Touch 2.1 which is focused on the new charting package as well as bug fixes. The charting package has had a major rewrite and includes SVG support on devices which can support it. Most devices perform faster with Canvas and will use that engine by default. We will be adding more charting types and other missing functionality in charts throughout the beta cycle. The next release will be more focused on performance enhancements with updates to the layouts and events.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Implemented SVG support for Draw
    • Pathing rewritten to have better garbage collection considerations/caching and it is now it's own class
    • Sprites are now optimized flyweight classes for primitives and composites
    • Sprites are now drawn via a shared flyweight implementation
    • Sprites now use Modifiers to handle animations and highlighting more robustly
    • Data aggregation rewritten with multiple strategies in mind
    • Sprites now use attribute configuration which can be used by the Modifiers
    • Re-architected Charts to be vastly simpler to create custom charts via spriting (ie: 3d Column example)
    • Charts no longer hide the axes when animating
    • Draw animation package rewritten and is purely transition based
    • Pan/Zoom redrawing is no longer faked via a CSS image but redrawn in real-time
    • Added Candlestick chart
    • Added OHLC chart
    • Changed Pie chart open animation
    • Added pseudo-3d Column chart custom example
    • Updated Stock Market sample application with a live preview
    • [TOUCH-2719] Deprecating increment in spinner field; renaming it to stepValue per the HTML5 input fields API
    • [TOUCH-2800] Implemented new WebSQL proxy
    • [TOUCH-2822] Added a getAllCount method to Store to get a full count including filtered records of the Store
    • [TOUCH-2888] Changed the default zIndex in message box to a larger number to stop accidental zIndex issues when creating other floating panels/components
    • [TOUCH-2928] Removed static properties of singleton Ext.data.JsonP
    • [TOUCH-1568] Added rightButton config and rightbuttontap event to navigation bar
    • [TOUCH-2816] NavigationView.pop can now use ComponentQuery
    • [TOUCH-2418] Added pattern config to Fields
    • [TOUCH-2818] Img components now center/stretch by default
    • [TOUCH-2789] Container.setActiveItem can now use ComponentQuery
    • [TOUCH-2480] Added allowToggle config to Button
    • [TOUCH-2] Top docked tab bars can now have icons
    • [TOUCH-2974] The setter method on associations now consistently return the instance
    • [TOUCH-2942] Stores are now unregistered when you destroy them
    • [TOUCH-3031] Allow JS files to be specified as remote
    • [TOUCH-3012] Removed "this is a developer preview" from the whats new guide
    • [TOUCH-3042] Allow hideOnMaskTap to be changed dynamically
    • [TOUCH-3052] Fieldset will now disable all inner fields when the disabled config is called
    • [TOUCH-3052] Changed form panel to use config to change inner disabled field config
    • [TOUCH-3014] Removed the relationship between a NavigationView's card animation and its bar animation
    • [TOUCH-2792] Implemented filters, sorters and paging into WebStorage proxy
    • [TOUCH-2844] Optimized clear method on WebStorage Proxy
    • [TOUCH-3040] Improved XML reader to support more complex mapping strings
    • [TOUCH-3064] Added a useCache configuration on Model. This can be set to false when having tree nodes exist in multiple trees
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-2672] Fixed an issue with top aligned labels on select fields where the icon was not vertically positions correctly
    • [TOUCH-2696] Fixed an issue with Ext.Msg where the previous title/message was being kept
    • [TOUCH-2748] Fixed an issue with updating list and picker when the store of a select field updates
    • [TOUCH-2690] Fixed an issue with select field change event firing twice
    • [TOUCH-2352] Fixed 'doubletap' event not to be fired when the second target is different from the first one
    • [TOUCH-3018] Fixed issues with SegmentedButton logic
    • [TOUCH-3019] Fixed issue with Android incorrectly detecting an orientation change when a keyboard pops up
    • [TOUCH-3022] Fixed issue with Picker using a incorrectly cached DataView
    • [TOUCH-3069] Fixed loadMoreCmp documentation tag
    • [TOUCH-3047] Fixed issue when setting the value of a Slot to 0
    • [TOUCH-3046] Fixed sizeChangeThrottleTimer timeout to be cleared upon destroy
    • [TOUCH-3058] Fixed issue where MsgBox content was too tall
    • [TOUCH-3068] Fixed issue which could cause an improper initial value of Picker
    • [TOUCH-3066] Fixed an issue where an undefined value was used as the request id on Connection
    • [TOUCH-3065] Fixed issue where records would not be removed from the store when events where suspended and removeAll was called
    • [TOUCH-3079] Fixed scrollToEnd to go x and y end
    • [TOUCH-3049] Fixed issue with MsgBox where the iconCls was being removed
    • [TOUCH-3072] Fixed issue with short titles being clipped in titlebar
    • [TOUCH-3044] Fixed button icon size with ui `small`
    • [TOUCH-3031] Fixed remote asset build
    • [TOUCH-2913] Fixed issue with stopping a NavigationView animation not measuring properly
    • [TOUCH-2996] Fixed success typo in device push class
    • [TOUCH-3109] Fixed LoadMask listeners not being passed to Viewport.setMasked()
    • [TOUCH-3011] Fixed HasOne association to add the field to the Owner model instead of the Associated Model and fixed the fields related to it
    • [TOUCH-2859] Fixed XTemplate to support dollar signs in tagnames
    • [TOUCH-2579] Fixed an issue with references where the config object wouldn't be passed in correctly the second time you call an autoCreate getter
    • [TOUCH-2724] Fixed issue where persist false wasn't respected by the WebStorage proxy
    • [TOUCH-2820] Fixed errant deprecation warnings in Controller
    • [TOUCH-2278] Fixed the History's back method to actually go to the previous action and made it a public method
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes
    • The Kitchensink example is becoming too large to fit into an iPad1's limited memory. We may break out some examples due to this issue.
    • The Draw/Chart implementation is incomplete and does not include the following:
      • Area Chart implementation
      • Bar Chart implementation
      • Stacked/Grouped Chart implementations
      • Gauge Chart implementation
      • Radar Chart implementation
      • Chart Legends
      • Chart Labels
      • Chart Highlighting
      • Polar Chart interactions
      • Icicle/TreeMap/Sunburst implementations
    • Scatter chart performance enhancements
    • Layout performance enhancements
    • 'painted' event performance enhancements
    • Card Layout performance enhancements
    • Resize detection performance enhancements
    • Masking performance enhancements
    • New DataView/List implementation for large data sets

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.2

Release Notes: Release Notes: June 28, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.2

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • [TOUCH-2815] Added better default styling to labels within toolbars
    • [TOUCH-2805] Added the option to autoSelect first option when you add options to a selectfield

    • [TOUCH-2642] Updated Map component to extend container which allows for masking
    • [TOUCH-2861] Removed onChange function from datepickerfield since it gets its change event form the picker
    • [TOUCH-2896] Removed unused minBackButtonWidth private property from NavigationBar
    • [TOUCH-2899] Removed old references to renderTpl from the documentation
    • Added information to getting started guide about using Miscrosft IIS
    • [TOUCH-2893] Allow year show be in reverse order for date picker
    • [TOUCH-2770] Added change event to Checkbox/Radio and unhide change event from Spinner
    • [TOUCH-2935] Added isSorted method to store
    • [TOUCH-2843] Added a 'clear' store event handler in Selectable

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.1

Release Notes: Release Notes: April 23, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.1

Special Notes:

If you are using a LocalStorage proxy, from now on your Model's identifier strategy must generate unique id's. We suggest you use the included UUID strategy by adding identifier: 'uuid' to your Model definition. Any existing Models you have saved to LocalStorage will need to have this added. A warning will be thrown for any Model configured with a LocalStorage proxy that doesn't have a unique id generating strategy.

The change event in Ext.field.Select has been changed to return the new and old values and not records. This is to make it more consistent with all other form fields.

The change event in Ext.field.Slider has been changed event now passes the Slider component

Removed the default Ext.MessageBox requirement, added a proper error when Ext.Msg is used without Ext.MessageBox the requirement

Refactored NavigationBar. NavigationBar now extends TitleBar and has ellipsis support. Animations in NavigationView on Android are now supported

Optimized Card Layout with extra absolute position wrapper, improves performance in complex applications and when docking items to the left/right

Implemented a new default ui for the radio field

Revamped Command, removed all binaries (now reside in SDK Tools installations entirely)

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • [TOUCH-2697] Added support for Cordova (PhoneGap 1.5+)
    • Added timestamp to the URL of every request to burst the browser's cache
    • [TOUCH-2365, TOUCH-1766] Changed local storage proxy to not generate id's for records. Instead it always uses the id defined on the record. This means that the model's identifier strategy has to generate unique id's when saving to local storage
    • [TOUCH-2674] Ext.layout.Card now uses this.cls + '-container' instead of a hard coded class name
    • [TOUCH-2516] Viewport's 'preventZooming' config is now false by default
    • [TOUCH-2732] Documented Model.isModel as private
    • Updated default generated app with more documentation and more defaults
    • Added performance optimizations to the layout css
    • Added performance optimizations to Card layout to prevent reflows
    • Added cleanups for icon, startupImage, factory() and docs
    • Added default startup images for retina-iPad
    • [TOUCH-2757] Updated hidden field to extend from field.Text so name attributes are added onto the input/component
    • [TOUCH-2757] Updated standardSubmit in form.Panel so it enabled all input fields within spinner fields to be enabled so the value gets posted
    • Added "?breakpoint" support for the sencha-touch-all-debug.js build
    • Added error stack trace and cross-domain XHR for dependencies resolution script
    • [TOUCH-2784] Updated Flex documentation
  • Bug Fixes
    • Fixed a bug for production microloader builds
    • [TOUCH-2643] Fixed a bug with datepickerfield where the date format was not being updated
    • [TOUCH-2668] Fixed animations and the location where you can tap a toggle field
    • [TOUCH-2685] Fixed for radio fields when their value is 0
    • [TOUCH-2384] Fixed requires not working within an overridden class
    • [TOUCH-2469] Fixed card layout animation config proxying to sub-animation instances
    • [TOUCH-2641, TOUCH-2682, TOUCH-2689] Fixed memory leaks related to removing items from Collections, Model Cache and Stores
    • [TOUCH-2468] Fixed handling of XHR status code 0
    • [TOUCH-2522] Fixed documentation for Ext.onReady and marked Ext.isReady flag as private
    • [TOUCH-2452] Fixed 'activate' being fired twice initially for a card item
    • [TOUCH-2657, TOUCH-2309] Fixed delayed repainting issue on iOS for button pressing
    • [TOUCH-1265] Fixed issue with update method not loading associated data in DataView/List
    • [TOUCH-2716] Fixed issue with ListPaging allowing loadMore to be tapped when there are no more records
    • Fixed issue with setting both 'docked' and a floating option of a component
    • [TOUCH-2419] Fixed Toggle's minValueCls and maxValueCls configs not being handled properly when changed
    • [TOUCH-2394]Fixed Draggable and SizeMonitor to cleanup properly when an element is destroyed
    • [TOUCH-2711] Fixed issue with initial tab configuration not showing
    • [TOUCH-2731] Fixed issue with select field where values passed to change event were just the display fields
    • [TOUCH-2665] Fixed issue with setActiveItem not working properly on a TabPanel
    • [TOUCH-2647] Fixed issue with 'selectionchange' not passing an array of the Models changed
    • [TOUCH-2720] Fixed an issue with selectfield where setting the value with no store/options would cause a hard error
    • [TOUCH-2747] Fixed issue with incorrect event signatures in NestedList and Slider
    • [TOUCH-2645] Fixed issues relating to filtering the same property multiple times
    • [TOUCH-2645] Fixed an issue where records would be destroyed before adding them to a store
    • [TOUCH-2462] Fixed Sencha Command not respecting 'ignore' items when generating native builds
    • [TOUCH-2761] Fixed issue with NavigationView not hiding the back button if no animation is used
    • Fixed issue with unwrapping Translated components on Android
    • Fixed issue with destroying a Card layout during animation on Android
    • Fixed sync loading to load "cache-busting" URLs
    • Fixed startup image logic for iOS <= 4.3 where media query is not supported properly
    • [TOUCH-2777] Fixed itemtaphold event on Component based DataViews
    • [TOUCH-2698] Fixed Android bottom TabBar blank icon issue on Android devices
    • Fixed paths with spaces not being decoded properly in Command
    • [TOUCH-2802] Fixed issue with Selectable not handling record removal properly
    • [TOUCH-2781] Fixed issue with togglefield where the value returned was an array
  • Known Issues
    • Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.
    • Dealing with localstorage and associations

Special Notes:

The change event in Ext.field.Select has been changed to return the new and old values and not records. This is to make it more consistent with all other form fields.

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.RC2

Release Notes: Release Notes: February 28, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.RC2

Special Notes:

The SASS $base-color in the default theme has been changed to Triton blue. If you want to continue to use the 1.x $base-color, you set it to `#354F6E` in your SASS theme file.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Updated base color to Triton blue
    • Updated bottom tabs CSS design to not use alpha channel and improve performance
    • $include-tab-highlights is now respected for bottom tabs
    • Simplified default button/tab badge styling
    • Added zebrastripe to list with a new $list-zebrastripe SASS configuration
    • [TOUCH-2165] Added a margin to message boxes so they will not stick to the edge of the screen
    • [TOUCH-2170] Added rounded corners on android devices on some examples
    • Removed a call to remove a custom cls in onClick; instead, it will remove when you call #show again
    • [TOUCH-2198] Removed desktop specific styling for fields in toolbars
    • [TOUCH-2211] Updated the documentation for field.Field#reset
    • [TOUCH-2225] Updated Operation to automatically match up a single created record, even when no clientId has been sent back
    • [TOUCH-2233] Added 'itemsingletap' event to DataView/List
    • Updated documentation for triggerEvent
    • [TOUCH-2234] Updated Nested List API example
    • [TOUCH-2171] SizeMonitor will no longer fire a sizing event the first time it is added to a container
    • [TOUCH-2247] Added support for empty headers in Lists
    • [TOUCH-2189] Added initialOffset to Draggable. Fixed an issue with clearing the constraint of a draggable item
    • Update Box layout docs to reflect proper CSS3 definition
    • [TOUCH-2228] If you specify an Ext.Loader path for your application's namespace outside of Ext.application (and therefore do not use the appFolder configuration), appFolder no longer overwrites the mapping
    • [TOUCH-2185] Trying to set the layout of a TabPanel to something that does not derive from a Card layout will now throw a hard error in debug mode
    • [TOUCH-2217] Stores defined in Controllers are now instantiated automatically just like Stores defined in Ext.application
    • [TOUCH-2242] Changed the logic of form#getValues slightly to allow for multiple values with the same name (saves as array) and the same for checkboxes and radio fields

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.RC

Release Notes: Release Notes: February 21, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.RC

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Added inline config to DataView and List. This allows for horizontal scrolling lists and optionally wraps at the container
    • [TOUCH-1894] Implemented PollingProvider, DirectStore, and DirectProxy
    • [TOUCH-2004] Added modifiedFieldNames and modifiedValues to the updaterecord signature in Store
    • Added a ui: 'round' to list to enable a rounded corner look to lists and grouped lists
    • Added an isLoaded function to store
    • [TOUCH-2025] Updated documentation on Video component
    • [TOUCH-2028] Updated documentation to indicate showAnimation should use an inbound animation such as fadeIn/slideIn and hideAnimation should use an configuration such as fadeOut/slideOut
    • [TOUCH-2029] Layout animations will now stop if interrupted
    • [TOUCH-2024] Reverted forms back to use box layout from table layout
    • [TOUCH-1925] When using a Server Proxy with a JSON Reader, the Operation is now given the correct error state if invalid JSON is returned from the server
    • [TOUCH-2046] Changed setting a default background to only effect card items
    • [TOUCH-2009] Ext.Ajax no longer throws an error when calling abort. Instead it sets the request success state to false and aborts the request correctly
    • [TOUCH-2026] Clarified build directory listing in the builds guide
    • [TOUCH-2047] Removed the @accessor tags from the Ext.app.Application configs that are not changeable after boot (home screen icon settings and start up screen images)
    • [TOUCH-2011] Changed card layout to not show the item when it is removed from the container IF it is being destroyed
    • Added a warning to application if you try and include a controller that doesn't extend app.Controller
    • [TOUCH-2054] Added a handleException method to DataView which will clear the LoadMask when a reader exception occurs. Users can override this method ago add custom error handling/alerts
    • [TOUCH-2027] Allow date picker/picker/slot to accept for null values
    • [TOUCH-2074] Added AJAX guide
    • Added O'Reilly example
    • [TOUCH-1474] Added TouchStyle example which includes an infinite scroller
    • Updated NestedList to prevent interaction on selection once an item is selected
    • Ext.application now sets the app's namespace before requires are processed. This means MyApp can requires:['MyApp.util.SomeClass'], which previously was not possible
    • [TOUCH-2099] Added a check for the change event in Select to ensure ti doesn't get fired when it hasn't changed
    • [TOUCH-2084] Added an 'updatedata' event to DataItem
    • Geolocation will now throw a locationerror event if the devices which do not support Geolocation
    • Moved models, views and stores configs from Application down to Controller
    • Added support for "?breakpoint" for sencha-touch-debug.js when released
    • [TOUCH-2077, TOUCH-2094] Improved initial viewport size detection on Android
    • [TOUCH-2082] Implemented a withCredentials configuration on Ajax proxy to allow cross-origin resources
    • [TOUCH-2082] Added ability to pass withCredentials to the Store#load method
    • Added the ability for beforeHooks in mixins to return false to prevent the original function from being called
    • [TOUCH-1922] Implemented the ability to configure your reader and model definition using metaData in your response
    • The default CSS ClassName for Button's press has been changed to 'x-button-pressing' from 'x-button-pressed'. 'x-button-pressed' is now used when the button is pressed in a SegmentedButton. SegmentedButton now listens to its Button's tap event and results in a much better user experience
  • Bug Fixes
    • [TOUCH-1983] Fixed Android's lack of native ISO 8601 Date parsing support
    • [TOUCH-2005] Fixed an issue that prevented Component DataView items to not be properly updated when changing a data field on a record
    • Fixed a regression with maxRows in field/Input

    • [TOUCH-2045] Fixed issue in Decorator when trying to detach from a component which has already been destroyed

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta3

Release Notes: Release Notes: February 13, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.beta3

Special Notes:

Application dependency logic has been tweaked to allow more versatility in specifying dependencies from packages outside your application. As of this release any combination of local and external dependencies should be possible, but you'll need use Ext.Loader.setPath to specify where external dependencies can be found. See the updated Application class docs for sample usage.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Markup/SASS Optimizations
      • Fixed performance of button tap!
      • Markup changed to be more table-like and not use flex-box
      • Checkbox changed to use a picto with a webkit-mask
      • Select dropdown images changed to use a picto with a webkit-mask
      • Removed unnecessary overflow css as this is handled with a gradient
    • New Guides
      • Added a new guide on using floating components
      • Added a new guide on Environment Detection
      • Added a new guide on Views in MVC
      • Added a new guide on Dependencies in MVC
    • Added support for Android Chrome Mobile
    • Improvements to Pull To Refresh plugin - allows it to work simultaneously with ListPaging and not clobber the Store
    • [TOUCH-1833] Add a check for HTC_ in the userAgent for some weird devices that ship with an OSX useragent
    • [TOUCH-1817] Added a record configuration to Component to bind a Model to a tpl
    • [TOUCH-1805] Updated the carousel indicator to update on dragEnd to give faster feedback to the user
    • [TOUCH-1602] Improved the Readers to create a single data extractor function instead of accessors for each field
    • [TOUCH-1873] hideOnMaskTap now properly defaults to false
    • Improved CSS for Scroller & Scroller Indicators
    • [TOUCH-1852] Removed the selected config from Selectable as this is not meant to be manipulated externally
    • [TOUCH-1818] Updated Translatable package to have the same consistent event signature with Scroller (x and y arguments separately instead of object with x and y properties)
    • Improved Scroller package - Significantly reduced file size by migrating to use Translatable
    • Refactored slot snapping feature for performance and accuracy
    • Ext.scroller.Scroller changed from being a factory to the main implementation
    • Updated Draggable to have consistent event signature with Scroller & Translatable (x & y arguments instead of 1 object)
    • Added removeChild() to Element
    • Renamed "ui" config to "indicatorsUi" for Indicators

    • Changed to default config of Animation's 'preserveEndState' to 'false', 'replacePrevious' to 'true'
    • [TOUCH-1924] Clean up counter item in localstorage
    • preventZooming is back to true by default. Other issues relating to using the Map component and anchor tags are resolved in this mode
    • Un-deprecated callOverridden()
    • Replaced all occurrences of console.* to Ext.Logger.*

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta2

Release Notes: Release Notes: February 8, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.beta2

Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.

Notes:

Navigation View has been updated so the 'stack' is now based on the items config/collection. This means that if you define more than 1 item in a navigation view, the last item will always be the active item. The animation methods have also been removed from Navigaiton View. Instead, you should change the animation using the view.getLayout().setAnimation() setter instead, just like you would on a Ext.Container.

The signature returned in the callback configuration of Ext.util.JSONP#request has changed. Previously it only returned the JSON object. It now returns the success value (Boolean) as the first argument and then the JSON object as the second argument. The class has also been deprecated

The sencha-touch-debug.js shipped with Beta 2 now includes deprecated compatibility methods. Please remember that in order to use the smaller build without compatibility, you will need to fix any deprecation warnings you receive during development

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Deprecated enterAnimation/exitAnimation in favor of showAnimation/hideAnimation as this is a more accurate description
    • [TOUCH-1400] Deprecated setRootNode and getRootNode methods.
    • Deprecated hide node configuration on TreeStore
    • [TOUCH-1593, TOUCH-1591] Added warnings when adding listeners to deprecated events on Store
    • Added deprecation warnings for Store sortOnLoad, filterOnLoad and sortOnFilter
    • [TOUCH-1605] Deprecated setOrientation, layoutOnOrientationChange, monitorOrientation, beforeorientationchange, and orientation change within component. Links added to Viewport where applicable. Warnings will now be thrown when using these old methods
    • [TOUCH-1627] Deprecated Container.cardSwitchAnimation
    • Deprecated Component#getEl()
    • [TOUCH-1615] Added the old flip, cube, wipe animations to Anim. Removed the now unused Anim-more.js file

    • [TOUCH-1700] Fixed issue with LoadMask in a scrollable container (dataview, list)
    • [TOUCH-1770] Fixed the SessionStorage proxy
    • [TOUCH-1779] Fixed Sheet's enter and exit options when using 'right'
    • [TOUCH-1779] Fixed a bug with Button where drag was calling release multiple times
    • [TOUCH-1565] Fixed the error message that is being thrown when defining a non-existing model on a Store
    • [TOUCH-1781] Fixed issues with merging in platform classes
    • Fixed sorting on a Component based DataView, Element based DataView
    • [TOUCH-1717] Fixed NestedList to work properly with new TreeStore events
    • Fixed documentation for Ext.Map deprecated members
    • [TOUCH-1790] Fixed the getById method on Store to not do a strict equal check
    • [TOUCH-1734] Fixed Video playback on Android 4
    • Fixed Reader's parsing of totalProperty - this is now set to null if a total was not explicitly sent back by the server
    • [TOUCH-1097] Fixed scrolling left from map carousel showing repayment schedule screen
    • [TOUCH-1797] Fixed issues which prevented element events from firing in the correct order (bubble up)
    • [TOUCH-1803] Fixed a 1px positioning issue with grouped list headers
    • Fixed a bug where creating two copies of a TreeStore, the root property accessor wouldn't be properly set on the Reader of the second TreeStore
    • Fixed an issue where the parent class updateProxy wasn't called in TreeStore. This caused the proxy to not have a model defined yet when it was building the extractors
    • [TOUCH-1810] Fixed issue with pausing inline video caused the video to stop on iOS
    • Fixed issue with Ext.app.Action so that it now uses the Profile namespace correctly to find a controller. Previously it had been incorrectly using the Profile name config, instead of the namespace config
    • [TOUCH-1816] Fixed Carousel setActiveItem() not hiding unused items
    • Fixed XML Writer
    • Fixed a bug where an assosciation's inverse wouldn't properly be found for an association
    • [TOUCH-1834] Fixed initialize method in Segmented Button to call callParent()
    • [TOUCH-1840] Fixed the check in Ext-more for PhoneGap to also check if it is *not* desktop when adding the listener. This means if you include phonegap.js and run on the desktop, it will still launch
  • Known Issues
    • The Chrome Mobile beta was just released this week. We expect to have proper detection and implementation beginning with the next release.
    • There is an issue witht he snapping the last item on Picker lists
    • Assosciations are not compatible with localstorage
    • WebStorage id are not in sync with Model's identifier strategy
    • Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.
    • Styling of the alignTo pointer and padding of the overlay are not quite correct yet

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta1

Release Notes: Release Notes: February 1, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.beta1

Note: if you have been using the preview Preview Release builds of Sencha Touch, be aware that B1 ships with an updated set of built JavaScript files. There are now five builds in total, all of which are described in the builds and building guide.

As of beta 1 most people will need to update their PRx app to use sencha-touch-debug.js while developing, then switch to sencha-touch.js in production.

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Viewport autoMaximize is now false by default
    • Implemented 'resize' event. For the best performance, use this only when you absolutely need to monitor a Component's size.. This replaces the need to manually use Ext.util.SizeMonitor
    • [TOUCH-945] Added an img xtype into Ext.Img
    • [TOUCH-785] Cleaned up TouchEvents example in Kitchen Sink, added docs for deprecated events
    • [TOUCH-1218] Added getDockedItems and getDockedComponent methods back into Ext.Container
    • [TOUCH-1415] Added a usePicker configuration to selectfield which defaults to 'auto' (which is then converted to true if it is a phone). Making the showPicker method public and adding some documentation
    • [TOUCH-1469] Using a store in a DataView that doesn't exist now throws a warning
    • [TOUCH-1475] Added docs for phoneStartupScreen and tabletStartupScreen
    • Updated the documentation for flex in component
    • Added deprecated getController to Ext.app.Controller
    • Allow Ext.data.Connection to add credentials to a CORS request
    • [TOUCH-1516] Deprecated ptype
    • [TOUCH-1147] Removed cruft from examples directory
    • Application#getController will now find non-profile specific controllers if a profile controller does not exist
    • Application no longer overrides a preconfigured Store ID when stores are specified via the Application stores config option
    • [TOUCH-1450] Added hideKeyboard to datepickerfield when you show the picker
    • Added 'initialize' event for Component
    • Added ComponentSize publisher which provide 'resize' events for any Component when there's at least one listener
    • Put back some the find and filter methods on Store
    • Made the Model constructor work without passing an empty config object
    • Added documentation for preventZooming and Ext.Viewport

    • Automatically change the field type of the id field to 'auto' if its set to anything else

    • Data Types now handles unparseable dates by throwing a warning instead of failing silently

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr4

Release Notes: Release Notes: January 23, 2012
Version Number: 2.0.0.pr4

  • Enhancements/Changes
    • Added 7 new guides, including a 1.x -> 2.x Migration Guide
    • Data refactored:
      • The data packed now makes full use of the config system and we recommend that configs be used with the data package as with the rest of your applications.
      • The performance of the data package has been signifigantly improved.
      • There are some event changes in the Data package and backwards compatibility for the old add, update, and remove events is not fully in place. The old events have severe performance implications and we strongly recommend all developers change to the new addrecords, updaterecord, and removerecords. In addition we have added a new 'refresh event' to supplant the old 'datachanged event' which was fired under too many circumstances.
      • Many issues with LocalStore/WebStore are resolved and this should now work properly. Please note that assosciated local stores are not in place yet.
      • Store paging is back in place and operational.
    • MVC refactored:
      • All MVC classes now consolidated under the Ext.app.* namespace
      • All classes now use the 2.x class and config system
      • Routes can now be defined on Controllers
      • The Router from 1.x has been reinstated
      • Device Profiles are now able to load their own dependencies if activated
      • Added 3 new guides - Intro to apps, Controllers and Device Profiles
      • Kitchen Sink updated to use device profiles, history and deep linking support
    • ComponentView refactored:
      • ComponentView is now fully integrated into DataView and it turned on by using the useComponents: true flag as a configuration option
      • The event signatures for DataView have been changed to handle both Element based items and Component based items. In addition the record is now passed on all the item events.
    • Event signature cleanup: We are standardizing events to pass their scope as their first argument The following events have been updated in this release:
      Class Event Passed Arguments
      Ext.carousel.Indicator next {Object} this, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.carousel.Indicator previous {Object} this, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.Container activate {Object} this, {Object} newActiveItem, {Object} oldActiveItem, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.Container add {Object} this, {Object} item, {Number} index, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.Container deactivate {Object} this, {Object} newActiveItem, {Object} oldActiveItem, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.Container remove {Object} this, {Object} item, {Number} index, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.Container renderedchange {Object} this, {Object} item, {Boolean} rendered, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.data.Store addrecords {Ext.data.Store} store, {Ext.data.Model[]} records, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.data.Store beforesync {Ext.data.Store} store, {Object} options, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.data.Store removerecords {Ext.data.Store} store, {Ext.data.Model[]} records, {Number[]} indices, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.data.Store updaterecord {Ext.data.Store} store, {Ext.data.Model[]} record, {Number} newIndex, {Number} oldIndex, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.data.Store refresh {Ext.data.Store} store, {Ext.util.Collection} data, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.dataview.element.Container itemdoubletap {Ext.dataview.element.Container} this, {Ext.Element} item, {Number} index, {Ext.EventObject} e, {Object} eOpts

      Ext.dataview.component.Container itemhold {Ext.dataview.component.Container} this, {Ext.dataview.DataItem} item, {Number} index, {Ext.EventObject} e, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.dataview.component.Container itemtouchend {Ext.dataview.component.Container} this, {Ext.dataview.DataItem} item, {Number} index, {Ext.EventObject} e, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.dataview.component.Container itemtouchmove {Ext.dataview.component.Container} this, {Ext.dataview.DataItem} item, {Number} index, {Ext.EventObject} e, {Object} eOpts
      Ext.dataview.component.Container itemtouchstart {Ext.dataview.component.Container} this, {Ext.dataview.DataItem} item, {Number} index, {Ext.EventObject} e, {Object} eOpts

    • [TOUCH-1392] Changed the bar in picker to be a Toolbar now a TitleBar, as titlebar is not made to work with lots of items

    • [TOUCH-1038, TOUCH-822] Changed default preventZooming of the Viewport to false. This allows for Map controls and links to work
    • [TOUCH-1028] Added a check for a number type in updateHtml
    • [TOUCH-1318] Removed Ext.Direct from Touch as it was added in PR3 by accident
    • [TOUCH-1384] Added the submit event into the dom publisher so we can prevent default in form elements
    • [TOUCH-1140] Added a check in app.Application to ensure the #name config has no spaces

    • Some animations are still not in place and will be added in a forthcoming release
    • Android 3/4 and Blackberry optimizations are not yet in place
    • The non-backwards-compatible version of Sencha Touch is not yet in place
    • Audio and Video components are not working properly on all supported devices
    • Fields in a Toolbar on Android have some display issues
    • Overlay and ShowBy are not fully implemented

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr3

Release Notes: Release Notes: December 9, 2011
Version Number: 2.0.0.pr3

  • Enhancements
    • Carousel refactored:
      • Carousel example rewritten, this is now a carousel of carousels each separate carousel has a set of 10 themed images (Food, Animals, Cars, Architecture)
      • Carousel animations are back in place
      • Native-like behaviors for both dragging and flicking
      • Now removes unused items from the DOM automatically to support large carousels
    • NavigationView added (name subject to change): A stack based view which allows you to push views onto the 'stack' at anytime. The view will automatically handle the animation of the title and the back button (when you have stack with more than one item).
    • [TOUCH-962] List.setGrouped() can now be set dynamically
    • Added tap event to Img component
    • Added decimal formatting to spinner
    • Fullscreen deprecation warning removed
    • Documentation for all events have been added
    • [TOUCH-1055] Added base Mask and LoadMask components. Added mask config to container
    • Added some convenience styling for item headers and footers. Should allow for easy rounded corners
    • Proper backwards compatibility added for 'dock' vs 'docked' in Containers
    • Added flashIndicator methods to scrollview and scrollTo end methods to scroller
    • NavigationBar renamed to TitleBar
    • Updated Map plugins GmapTracker and GmapTraffic
    • Swapped the order of "deactivate" and "activate" events
    • Added Component Translatable behavior
    • Added minPosition to scroller Abstract (counterpart to maxPosition)
    • [TOUCH-131] Added $form-label-background-color for styling the form label background color
    • [TOUCH-1129] Added Ext.Viewport.hideKeyboard method to force the keyboard to be removed from the screen in iOS
  • Bug Fixes
    • Fix issue where modal components were trying to remove a cls from a dom, after it was removed.
    • [TOUCH-811] Fixed tapping on HashTags on the iPad1
    • [TOUCH-812] Fixed tapping on links on the iPad1
    • [TOUCH-888] Added bodyPadding, bodyMargin and bodyBorder methods into Ext.Panel
    • [TOUCH-427] Fixed MessageBox not resizing based on message content
    • [TOUCH-1033] readOnly fields will no longer show a clearIcon
    • [TOUCH-818] Nested List example: In the detail view, the padding was moved so it will not affect the scrollbar
    • [TOUCH-829] Twitter example no longer displays a blank field in search items for empty searches
    • [TOUCH-1032] Fixed Tab Panel crashing when no items are present. Also fix animation direction of tabs.
    • [TOUCH-1043] Fixed issue with update which ensures listeners and eventBubble are processed first
    • [TOUCH-1027] Fixed issues with emptyText on DataView/List
    • [TOUCH-1023] Fixed Ext.field.Select to allow for remote stores
    • [TOUCH-814] Ajax example now displays a loading mask
    • [TOUCH-520] Removed Guide example
    • [TOUCH-1030] Fixed issue with Map rendering before the dom is painted
    • [TOUCH-753] Map added back to Kiva example
    • [TOUCH-1041] Forced styleHtmlContent to a boolean
    • [TOUCH-808] Added completion amount to Kiva example
    • [TOUCH-1044] Fixed issues with floating items within a fit layout
    • Fixed scrolling body on desktop
    • [TOUCH-1053] Fix an issue when container with a tpl and scrollable
    • Replaced alias with xtype in class definitions, reduced code using proxyConfig
    • Added Translatable and its implementations, refactored Draggable to use Translatable
    • Refactored Slider / Thumb / Toggle to work with new version of Draggable
    • [TOUCH-989] Reset scroll position when refresh is called. In addition, removed itemIndex property from the dom as it was not maintained when changes to the store changed the index. Instead the getViewItems now returns a proper array and indexOf is used
    • Fixed a bug with card show events being called twice
    • [TOUCH-1054] Fixed issue with defaults: {hidden:true} in NavigationBar
    • [TOUCH-1061] Call parent method of initialize in Button
    • [TOUCH-1074] Fix issue with select/deselect when called with an index
    • [TOUCH-1073] Fix recursive method call when abort is called with JSONP
    • [TOUCH-1057] Set default labelAlign to left
    • [TOUCH-1057/1052] Fixed label align issues, and rounded corner issues with fieldset
    • [TOUCH-1046] Fixed various issues with Map.mapOptions. Deprecated the update method as it conflicts with the base Component update. This is now setMapCenter as that is what 'update' actually does. Remove the now unused onUpdate method
    • [TOUCH-1072] Fixed a small issue with floating items inside containers
    • Added animation to Translatable, integrated into Slider
    • [TOUCH-1090] Fixed issues with Nested Loading example in KitchenSink. Added emptyText config as well
    • [TOUCH-501] Fixed CSS styling within google maps
    • [TOUCH-954] Changed deprecated createDelegate to bind in GeoLocation
    • [TOUCH-916] Deprecated useClearIcon in favor of clearIcon
    • [TOUCH-1139] Put plugins support back in
    • [TOUCH-739] Map example updated and working properly
    • Fixed a bug with Picker where it removed all items, not just slots
    • Fixed TabBar configuration issues with TabPanel
    • Fixed a config issue with tabBarPosition
    • Fixed Format.date
    • Move plugins to proper directory and fix namespaces. Remove plugins from ignore.
    • Fixed an issue with AbstractScroller scrollToEnd methods
    • [TOUCH-1173] Fixed some timeout issues when destroying a button
    • [TOUCH-1183] load/filter/sort events will now refresh the selections on a list
    • Fix issues relating to the browser not passing TouchEnd events under stress. Touch can now recover from this gracefully
    • Re-enable pull to refresh - not complete, styling needs to be updated
    • [TOUCH-1187] Fixed problem with setting a DatePicker to null
    • [TOUCH-1212] clearIcontap now fires the change event
  • Known Issues
    • Updated MVC with Routing/History/Deep Linking/Profiles will be in the next release
    • The Data package currently cannot yet be configured by passing 'config' parameters. This will be implemented in the next release.
    • Some animations are still not in place and will be added in a forthcoming release
    • Android 3 and Blackberry optimizations are not yet in place
    • We are standardizing all events to pass their scope as their first argument. This will affect 40 Events and will be put in place in the next release. When implemented we will provide full documentation for all the events affected by this change.

Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr2

Release Notes: Release Notes: November 10, 2011
Version Number: 2.0.0.pr2

New In This Release

  • Enhancements
    • Forms have been refactored to be less component heavy for better performance
    • Added Android native packaging guide
    • contentEl has been re-implemented on Components
    • Updated documentation for autoCreateViewport to clarify how it works
    • listeners and bubbleEvents config options and now guarenteed run prior to other configurations
    • [TOUCH-930] DataView and List now use proper getters when retrieving data from their Store
    • [TOUCH-775] Developer calls to Store.loadRecords will now fire 'clear' and 'add' events when appropriate
    • [TOUCH-831] Added a 'sort' event to Store
    • [TOUCH-842] Added a 'filter' event to Store
    • [TOUCH-908] Added emptyText support to DataView/List

    • [TOUCH-793] Completed Geolocation class refactor
    • [TOUCH-928] Include jsb3 file in the distribution
    • [TOUCH-22] If a component's 'html' property is set, it will default 'styleHtmlContent' to true
    • [TOUCH-802] TextArea icon is now top aligned
    • [TOUCH-859] readOnly attribute added to fields
    • [TOUCH-927] Deprecate html in Button in favor of badgeText
